segments.text: Hello ! Tomorrow I'm going to need a wake-up call .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a problem . What time shall we call you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I always hit the snooze button , so give me two calls , one at 7 and another at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It'll be our pleasure . We'll call you at 7 and then at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oops , cancel that . Change the second call to 7 thirty will you , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No sooner said than done . Can I help you with anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that's about it for now . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , sir . Have a pleasant evening .
segments.speaker: S2
